rows.label: qst002204_msg0001
rows.name:
What? Mellica? I don't know much
about the members of the Choir.

rows.label: qst002204_msg0002
rows.name:
But I can tell you a little
about the Choir itself.

rows.label: qst002204_msg0003
rows.name:
I hear that if you get into the
Choir, you can live a wealthy life.

rows.label: qst002204_msg0004
rows.name:
I mean, it's an organization
run by the Holy See, so they're
bound to treat you well.

rows.label: qst002204_msg0005
rows.name:
For us refugees, it's a very
attractive opportunity.

rows.label: qst002204_msg0006
rows.name:
Well, I didn't get in... My mom
and dad were pretty disappointed.
